item.title: The lady on the Zoom call
item.description: The lady on your Zoom call: she has a soul. Find it. The AI that’s helping you. It has a soul. Never waste the possibility of Soul’s Existence.

item.title: AI for the Rest of Us: A Hands-On Workshop

I’ll announce the dates soon. ðŸš€ ANNOUNCING TWO SESSIONS: “AI for the Rest of Us” - A Hands-On Workshop “AI for the Rest of Us” - It’s Not Just About Work Tasks I’ve been reflecting on what makes our upcoming AI workshop truly special, and I wanted to share more about the journey we’ll take together… This isn’t just another “productivity hack” class.
